question: いい加減にしろ
sourceMnemonic: You know how <ja>いい加減</ja> is unfounded or pointless? Because if you <kanji>add</kanji> and then <kanji>decrease</kanji> you haven't really done anything? Well, this is like saying "do the pointless!" Okay, that doesn't make any sense. This is a phrase that means something similar to <vocabulary>cut it out</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>cut the BS</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as <ja>いい加減</ja>, which you (hopefully) learned earlier.
